game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has shattered, the fabric of reality is torn apart, and ancient secrets are unearthed. Players take on the role of an amnesiac protagonist who must navigate the fragmented timeline to prevent the destruction of entire civilizations. Guided by mysterious allies and pursued by powerful enemies, the protagonist must master the art of temporal manipulation to restore the flow of time and uncover the truth behind their own forgotten past.
game.beginning: The game begins with the protagonist awakening in a desolate wasteland, surrounded by scattered remnants of ancient technology. As they stumble upon an ancient artifact, they discover their ability to manipulate time and begin their journey through the shattered timeline.
game.ending: Ultimately, the protagonist must face off against the mastermind behind the destruction of time: a powerful being known only as 'The Timekeeper.' By harnessing the power of the timestream, the protagonist can defeat The Timekeeper and restore balance to the universe. However, the true challenge lies in the consequences of their actions, as the player must confront the butterfly effects of altering the timeline.
